name: Faded Photograph
description: A worn photograph of happier times. Brings courage in dark moments.
tooltip: Increases Resilience by 1

name: Broken Toy
description: A reminder of childhood innocence. Sharpens focus in battle.
tooltip: Increases attack damage by 1

name: Dusty Locket
description: A locket coated in years of dust. Reminds you of secrets kept.
tooltip: Increases Resilience by 2 • Grants 1 shield at combat start for 1 turns

name: Father's Watch
description: An old wristwatch ticking irregularly. He always tried to be on time.
tooltip: Increases Max HP by 5 • Increases chance of perfect dice by 0.1%

name: Mum's Perfume
description: A faint floral scent that surfaces when fear rises. Comforting but fleeting.
tooltip: Increases Insight by 2 • Grants 3 shield at combat start for 0 turns

name: Superpower Serum
description: A vial of neon liquid that warps memories. How quickly the truth weakens.
tooltip: Increases Strength by 4 • Increases maximum possible dice roll by 1 • Increases chance of rare loot by -0.15%

name: Bloodied Tenderizer
description: Still sticky. Some stains never wash off.
tooltip: Increases attack damage by 3 • Critical hits inflict 2 bleed for 3 turns • Increases Insight by -1

name: Empty Lunchbox
description: Hungry for second chances. Hunger of a different kind.
tooltip: Increases Max HP by 3 • Gives 0.15% chance to force enemy dice rerolls

name: Juice-Stained Yearbook
description: Pages stick together, memories do not. Everyone signed it, nobody knew you.
tooltip: Increases Resilience by 2 • Increases Insight by 1

name: Intimidating Presence
description: A feeling that makes foes tremble. Strength is blinding when false.
tooltip: Increases attack damage by 2 • Expands critical hit range by 1 (more rolls become critical) • Increases chance of rare loot by -0.1%

name: Engraved Pen
description: Your name scratched in steel ambition. They finally saw your worth.
tooltip: Guarantees the first dice roll each battle is a critical hit • Increases chance of perfect dice by 0.08%

name: Framed Memo
description: Recognition behind cracked glass. The frame is cracked. It still hangs.
tooltip: Increases chance of relic loot by 0.05% • Increases Insight by 1

name: Stress Ball
description: Squeezes out tension—and honesty. You kept it together. For now.
tooltip: Increases Insight by 1 • Increases Resilience by -1

name: Hush Money
description: Bills soaked in silence. No one talks about it. Especially you.
tooltip: Increases chance of rare loot by -0.2% • Reduces fragment costs by 1 • Increases Strength by 2

name: Electric Blanket
description: Warmth without company. You're warm now. Alone.
tooltip: Increases Resilience by 3 • Increases defense by 1

name: Baby Monitor
description: Static filled with watchful whispers. You were always listening. Or were you?
tooltip: Grants 2 shield at combat start for 2 turns • Increases chance of rare loot by 0.1%

name: Best Dad Certificate
description: Awarded ironically. It's the thought that counts. Right?
tooltip: Reduces enemy dice results by 1 • Increases Insight by 1

name: Empty Crib
description: Rocking gently with absence. No one wakes you.
tooltip: Increases chance of rare loot by -0.15% • Heals 1 HP at the start of each turn

name: Broken Flask
description: Smells like escape. Still smells like escape.
tooltip: Reduces fragment costs by 1 • Increases Resilience by 1

name: Unsent Letter
description: Folded regrets waiting to speak. Written. Never sent. Still folded in your jacket.
tooltip: Increases Insight by 2 • Increases Strength by -1

name: Family Bondo
description: Holds cracks together—for now. Held together with the wrong stuff.
tooltip: Reduces incoming damage by 0.25%

name: Obituary Clipping
description: Printed finality lies lightly. They wrote what they were told.
tooltip: Increases chance of rare loot by -0.1% • Increases Strength by 2

name: Gold Watch
description: A lifetime engraved in brass. Time finally weighs in your pocket.
tooltip: Increases chance of rare loot by 0.2% • Increases Insight by 2

name: Shifting Photo
description: Subjects vanish when unobserved. One minute he's there, the next a blank space.
tooltip: Increases Insight by 2 • Expands critical hit range by 1 (more rolls become critical)

name: Empty Chair
description: Reserved for missing souls. Reserved for someone who never came.
tooltip: Allows rerolling fragment selection 1 times • Increases Resilience by 1

name: Mended Ring
description: The seam is almost invisible. It's not broken.
tooltip: Reduces fragment costs by 1 • Increases Max HP by 3

name: Namesake
description: A legacy carried in a name. He gave him my name.
tooltip: Increases chance of rare loot by 0.15% • Increases Insight by 3

name: Blank Name Badge
description: Identity pending. You weren't forgotten. Just overwritten.
tooltip: Increases Insight by 2

name: Gate Lock
description: Blocks regret—sometimes. You never spoke again. But he remembered.
tooltip: Allows rerolling insight checks 1 times

name: Silver Spoon
description: Privilege with a metallic taste. We'll get together then, son.
tooltip: Increases chance of rare loot by -0.1% • Increases Strength by 2

name: Family Album
description: Truth bound between covers. It's complete—and sobering.
tooltip: Increases Resilience by 3 • Increases Insight by 2

name: Unusual Polaroid
description: Image shifts when unattended. Something seems off...
tooltip: Increases Insight by 2

name: Unfilled Script
description: Lines yet to be lived. You left the script blank. But not unread.
tooltip: Allows skipping fragment selection 1 times • Increases Insight by 1

name: Key to the City
description: Opens doors to ego. The key unlocks more than doors.
tooltip: Increases chance of rare loot by -0.25% • Increases Strength by 4 • Increases Max HP by 10

name: Death Certificate
description: Ink still drying. The end?
tooltip: Reduces fragment costs by 1 • Increases Insight by 3

name: Flickering Halo
description: Light that doubts itself. You were almost something greater.
tooltip: Increases Insight by 3 • Grants 2 shield at combat start for 0 turns

name: Reunion Tour Ticket
description: One last show for old times. Just one more stop.
tooltip: Creates a duplicate of another equipped memento • Increases Resilience by 1

name: Garage Key
description: Smells of oil and nostalgia. Keep digging. The oil never runs out.
tooltip: Grants access to corrupted memory levels • Increases Strength by 2 • Increases Insight by 2

name: Childhood Eraser
description: Pink rubber worn smooth by desperate attempts to undo the past.
tooltip: Increases Resilience by 1 • Removes 0 negative status effects at combat start

name: Cremation Ashes
description: A small vial of what remains. Warm to the touch with faded love.
tooltip: Reduces burn damage by 0.5% • Increases Resilience by 1

name: Strange Key
description: Keys to rooms that echo with absence. Survival lingers in familiar spaces.
tooltip: Increases Max HP by 2 • Heals 1 HP at the start of each turn

name: Reading Glasses
description: Cracked lenses that reveal harsh truths—but leave you vulnerable to them.
tooltip: Expands critical hit range by 1 (more rolls become critical) • Increases defense by -1

name: Lucky Coin
description: Worn smooth by anxious fingers. Cuts through uncertainty.
tooltip: Expands critical hit range by 1 (more rolls become critical)

name: Paper Crown
description: Paper crown from a childhood party. Glory without consequence.
tooltip: Increases critical hit damage multiplier by 0.25%

name: Tourniquet
description: Wrapped tight from playground fights. Slows the swing, deepens the wound.
tooltip: Increases damage-over-time effect potency by 1 • Increases attack damage by -1

name: Moldy Bandage
description: From a wound that wouldn't heal. Infections linger longer than they should.
tooltip: Increases damage-over-time effect duration by 1 turns

name: Broken Inhaler
description: Empty when you needed it most. Symptoms hit immediately.
tooltip: Damage-over-time effects deal instant damage when applied

name: Heavy Keychain
description: Dad's work keys that weighed down his pocket. Burden shared is burden doubled.
tooltip: Increases crowd control effect duration by 1 turns • Limits maximum dice roll to -1

name: Salt Shells
description: Riot control rounds from dad's army days. 'Less-lethal' can't say non-lethal anymore...
tooltip: Increases crowd control effect duration by 1 turns

name: Broken Stopwatch
description: Frozen at the moment of impact. When time stops, opportunity begins.
tooltip: Gain an extra die next turn when stunning an enemy

name: Weighted Die
description: Loaded for luck, heavy with guilt. Great fortune or great failure.
tooltip: Increases maximum possible dice roll by 2 • Take 2 damage when rolling a 1

name: Expired Adderall
description: From college cramming sessions. Focus that burns out fast and hard.
tooltip: Critical hits grant +2 attack for 0 turns

name: Rabbit's Foot
description: From childhood superstitions. Luck comes to those who believe in it.
tooltip: Guarantees the first dice roll each battle is a critical hit

name: Dried Rose
description: From the bouquet you never gave. Beauty and pain intertwined.
tooltip: Reflects 1 damage to attackers • Increases defense by -1

name: Thick Bandage
description: From years of hard work. Numb to pain but numb to everything.
tooltip: Increases defense effect potency by 1

name: Beauty Mirror
description: Warped reflection from childhood meals. Pain shared is pain doubled.
tooltip: Reflects 0.25% of all damage taken

name: Safety Pin
description: Bent from nervous fidgeting. Hurts you to hurt them more.
tooltip: Increases thorns damage by 1 • Increases self-damage by 1%

name: One-Armed Scissor
description: From love letters never sent. Every wound teaches you to wound back.
tooltip: Gain thorns equal to self-damage taken

name: Black Eyeliner
description: Mom's shade, worn to hide the bruises. Pain reflects in every surface.
tooltip: Reflects 1.0% of self-damage to enemies

name: Rosary Beads
description: Blown out too soon. Brief protection, briefer hope.
tooltip: Reduces self-damage by 0.5% during divinity • Increases divinity duration by -1 turns

name: Communion Wafer
description: Crystallized on old pillowcases. Sacred suffering shields you.
tooltip: Blocks self-damage while divinity is active

name: Holy Water
description: From grandmother's funeral dress. Suffering transforms to grace.
tooltip: Converts 1.0% of self-damage to healing during divinity

name: Sack of Coins
description: From every job interview. Nervous energy that spreads and lingers.
tooltip: Extend damage-over-time effects by 1 turns when stunning • Limits maximum dice roll to -1

name: Knuckle Dusters
description: From learning to press shirts alone. Burns that seal shut immediately.
tooltip: DoT effects deal instant damage when target is stunned

name: Ball Gag
description: Smothering nightmares. Suffocation builds with time.
tooltip: Increase DoT potency by 1 each turn while stunned

name: Empty Wallet
description: After the divorce settlement. Less to find, more to fight for.
tooltip: Critical hits inflict 1 bleed for 0 turns • Increases defense by -1

name: Razor Blade
description: Hidden in the medicine cabinet. Let the pain flow out.
tooltip: Critical hits inflict 1 bleed for 0 turns

name: Whetstone
description: For sharpening kitchen knives. Edges that cut through everything.
tooltip: Burn reduces shield effectiveness by 0.75% • Next attack ignores defense • Increases attack damage by -1

name: Match Head
description: Struck in anger, burned in regret. Rotten brimstone of old fights.
tooltip: Being burned grants pierce for the turn

name: Heartburn
description: Acid reflux from swallowing pride. Shield turns to slag under pressure.
tooltip: Burn prevents shield and makes attacks piercing

name: Thunder Blanket
description: A heavy wool blanket that muffles the storms of memory. Strengthens resolve.
tooltip: Multiplies Resilience by 1.5x

name: The Remedy
description: A vial of clear liquid that neutralizes all toxins. Some poisons are in the mind.
tooltip: Immunity to poison effects • Increases Insight by 1

name: Introspection
description: A polished mirror that reflects not your face, but your understanding. Wisdom doubled.
tooltip: Multiplies Insight by 2x

name: The Full Picture
description: A completed photo album showing life as it truly was. Clarity brings understanding.
tooltip: Multiplies Insight by 1.5x • Increases Resilience by 2

name: Extra Life
description: A second chance when all seems lost. Death is not always final.
tooltip: Revives with full health on death (once per run) • Increases Max HP by 10
